title: Rare Earth - Greatest Hits And Rare Classics@320
description:
This collection is marred by abbreviated versions of "Get Ready," "I Know I&#039;m Losing You," and others. For fans who didn&#039;t purchase individual albums, though, this is a good overall view of their work. The tender "Keepin&#039; Me Out of the Storm" shows a different side of the rockers; it&#039;s melodic and would fit well on Quiet Storm formats. Rare Earth excelled at remaking tunes and putting their own stamp on them, as they do on "Chained," made famous by Marvin Gaye. Lead singer Peter Hoorelbeke had a powerful voice that didn&#039;t take a back seat to anybody&#039;s.



01. Get Ready                                                    
02. Generation (Light Up The Sky)                                
03. (I Know) I&#039;m Losing You                                      
04. When Joanie Smiles                                           
05. Born To Wander                                               
06. Here Comes The Night

08. Love Shines Down

11. We&#039;re Gonna Have A Good Time                                 
12. Big John Is My Name                                          
13. Chained                                                      
14. Warm Ride                                                    
15. I Can Feel My Love Risin&#039;                                    
16. Keepin&#039; Me Out Of The Storm                                  
17. It Makes You Happy (But It Ain&#039;t Gonna Last)                 
18. Midnight Lady

20. Fresh From The Can
